  "title": "Social Media Manager",
  "description": "At Fast Recruiters Consulting Services, we are dedicated to providing top-tier Human Resources solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses and professionals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Etete Road, Benin City - Edo
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

About the Role


	You will manage the online presence of a growing food vendor business. Your work will help attract customers, showcase meals, and keep the brand active across platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and grow the business&rsquo;s social media pages (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, etc.).
	Create engaging content that highlights meals, promotions, customer experiences, and daily activities.
	Plan and schedule posts to ensure consistent online activity.
	Respond to comments, messages, and enquiries promptly.
	Shoot and edit product photos and videos.
	Use Canva and CapCut to design graphics and edit short-form videos.
	Track engagement and suggest improvements.
	Work with the business team to develop weekly content themes.
	Monitor trends in food, lifestyle, and social media.


Requirements


	Minimum qualification of OND / NCE.
	Demonstrated experience managing social media pages.
	Hands-on skills in content creation (photos, videos, captions).
	Proficiency in Canva and CapCut.
	Good communication skills.
	Strong attention to detail.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Interest in food, cooking, and customer engagement.


Preferred Qualities:


	Creative mindset and willingness to experiment with new ideas.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced small business environment.
	Familiarity with TikTok/Reels trends around food.


Salary
N100,000 / Month.",

Social Media Manager Job at Fast Recruiters Consulting Services




        
    

        
        At Fast Recruiters Consulting Services, we are dedicated to providing top-tier Human Resources solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses and professionals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Etete Road, Benin City - Edo
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

About the Role


	You will manage the online presence of a growing food vendor business. Your work will help attract customers, showcase meals, and keep the brand active across platforms.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage and grow the business’s social media pages (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, etc.).
	Create engaging content that highlights meals, promotions, customer experiences, and daily activities.
	Plan and schedule posts to ensure consistent online activity.
	Respond to comments, messages, and enquiries promptly.
	Shoot and edit product photos and videos.
	Use Canva and CapCut to design graphics and edit short-form videos.
	Track engagement and suggest improvements.
	Work with the business team to develop weekly content themes.
	Monitor trends in food, lifestyle, and social media.


Requirements


	Minimum qualification of OND / NCE.
	Demonstrated experience managing social media pages.
	Hands-on skills in content creation (photos, videos, captions).
	Proficiency in Canva and CapCut.
	Good communication skills.
	Strong attention to detail.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Interest in food, cooking, and customer engagement.


Preferred Qualities:


	Creative mindset and willingness to experiment with new ideas.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced small business environment.
	Familiarity with TikTok/Reels trends around food.


Salary
N100,000 / Month.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "General Ledger Accountant",
  "description": "Persianas Retail Limited (PRL) is a leading retail company in Nigeria that offers an array of fashion and lifestyle products and services to customers across Nigeria. We have built valuable partnerships with renowned brands such as&nbsp;Pumaand&nbsp;Lacoste,cementing our reputation as a trusted retail leader. Our extensive distribution channels include physical stores,&nbsp;e-commerce, and Wholesale Distributors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Ledger Accountant
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced General Ledger Accountant to support accurate financial reporting across our retail operations.
	The ideal candidate will manage general ledger activities, perform key reconciliations, and provide financial insights that strengthen decision-making.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and review daily, weekly, and monthly bank reconciliations; resolve reconciling items.
	Maintain cashbook records and liaise with banks on settlement or processing issues.
	Reconcile revenue from retail stores and e-commerce channels; ensure accurate revenue recognition.
	Post and validate journal entries, complete monthly balance sheet reconciliations across AP, AR, payroll, inventory, and fixed assets.
	Support month-end and year-end close; ensure an audit-ready GL.
	Conduct variance analysis and support budgeting, forecasting, and management reporting.
	Prepare audit schedules and recommend process improvements.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	4&ndash;5 years of progressive accounting experience, ideally in GL or financial reporting.
	ICAN or ACCA (completed or in final stage).
	Strong knowledge of IFRS and financial controls.
	Proficient in Excel and ERP systems (Sage, SAP, ZohoBooks, etc.).


Skills:


	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	High ethical standards and confidentiality
	Clear communication and teamwork
	Problem-solving and continuous improvement mindset


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@persianasretail.com&nbsp;using &quot;General Ledger Accountant&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

        Persianas Retail Limited (PRL) is a leading retail company in Nigeria that offers an array of fashion and lifestyle products and services to customers across Nigeria. We have built valuable partnerships with renowned brands such as Pumaand Lacoste,cementing our reputation as a trusted retail leader. Our extensive distribution channels include physical stores, e-commerce, and Wholesale Distributors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Ledger Accountant
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an experienced General Ledger Accountant to support accurate financial reporting across our retail operations.
	The ideal candidate will manage general ledger activities, perform key reconciliations, and provide financial insights that strengthen decision-making.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and review daily, weekly, and monthly bank reconciliations; resolve reconciling items.
	Maintain cashbook records and liaise with banks on settlement or processing issues.
	Reconcile revenue from retail stores and e-commerce channels; ensure accurate revenue recognition.
	Post and validate journal entries, complete monthly balance sheet reconciliations across AP, AR, payroll, inventory, and fixed assets.
	Support month-end and year-end close; ensure an audit-ready GL.
	Conduct variance analysis and support budgeting, forecasting, and management reporting.
	Prepare audit schedules and recommend process improvements.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	4–5 years of progressive accounting experience, ideally in GL or financial reporting.
	ICAN or ACCA (completed or in final stage).
	Strong knowledge of IFRS and financial controls.
	Proficient in Excel and ERP systems (Sage, SAP, ZohoBooks, etc.).


Skills:


	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	High ethical standards and confidentiality
	Clear communication and teamwork
	Problem-solving and continuous improvement mindset


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@persianasretail.com using "General Ledger Accountant" as the subject of the mail.
